accountTerms.content: To use our Service, you must create an account and provide accurate, complete, and current information.

eligibility.content: You must be at least 16 years old (or 13 years old in the United States) to create an account. You must provide a valid email address and other required information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

responsibilities.content: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

ordering.title: 3. Ordering Process & Order Acceptance
ordering.content: Our ordering process is designed to be simple and transparent.

process.title: Order Placement
process.content: Orders are placed through our website interface. You will receive an order confirmation email once your order is successfully submitted. No order is accepted by us until we send you an order confirmation.

acceptance.title: Order Acceptance
acceptance.content: We reserve the right to accept or decline any order for any reason, including but not limited to: pricing errors, insufficient inventory, or violation of these Terms. We may also require additional verification before accepting an order.

review.title: Order Review
review.content: You are responsible for reviewing your order details immediately after receiving the confirmation email. You must notify us of any errors within 24 hours of receiving the confirmation.

pricing.title: 4. Pricing & Payment Terms
pricing.content: Our pricing is transparent and all-inclusive.

prices.title: Product Pricing
prices.content: Prices are displayed in your local currency where applicable. All prices include applicable taxes for EU customers. Non-EU customers may be responsible for import duties and taxes in their country.

payment.title: Payment Processing
payment.content: Payment is processed through secure third-party payment processors. We do not store your payment card information. Payment must be made in full at the time of order placement.

errors.title: Pricing Errors
errors.content: We reserve the right to correct pricing errors. If we discover a pricing error after order placement, we will contact you to confirm the correct price or cancel the order if you prefer.

cancellation.title: 5. Cancellation & Refund Policy
cancellation.content: We understand that plans change, and we've designed our policies to be fair and transparent.

cancellationWindow.title: Cancellation Window
cancellationWindow.content: You may cancel your order within 48 hours of placing it, provided that AI generation has not yet begun. Once AI generation starts, orders cannot be cancelled due to the personalized nature of our products.

personalizedProducts.title: Personalized Products Exclusion
personalizedProducts.content: In accordance with EU Consumer Rights Directive Article 16(c) and similar laws in other jurisdictions, personalized products are excluded from standard return rights. Our products are manufactured to your specifications and are clearly personalized.

defects.title: Defective Products
defects.content: If your book arrives with manufacturing defects (printing errors, binding issues, damage during shipping), please contact us within 14 days of receipt. We will arrange for a free replacement or full refund, including shipping costs.

process.title: Cancellation Process
process.content: To cancel an order, please contact our customer service team with your order number. We will process cancellations within 24 hours during business days.

delivery.title: 6. Delivery & Shipping
delivery.content: We deliver worldwide with reliable shipping partners.

timeframes.title: Delivery Timeframes
timeframes.content: Production typically takes 3-5 business days, plus shipping time. Shipping times vary by location: 3-5 days for domestic orders, 7-14 days for international orders. These are estimates and not guaranteed.

risk.title: Risk and Title
risk.content: Risk of loss passes to you upon delivery to the shipping carrier. Title to the products passes to you upon full payment. You must be available to accept delivery or make arrangements for receipt.

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.content: You will receive tracking information once your order ships. We recommend monitoring your shipment and contacting the carrier directly for delivery issues.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: We respect intellectual property rights and clearly define ownership.

ourRights.content: All content, features, and functionality of the Service are owned by KidBook Creator Ltd. and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

yourRights.content: Upon full payment, you receive a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use your purchased book for personal, non-commercial purposes. You may not reproduce, distribute, or commercially exploit the content without our written consent.

aiContent.content: AI-generated illustrations and content are licensed to you for personal use only. We retain all rights to the underlying AI models and algorithms.

prohibited.content: You may not upload content that: is illegal, threatening, defamatory, hateful, or discriminatory; infringes on intellectual property rights; contains copyrighted characters or protected brand logos; violates privacy rights; or is otherwise inappropriate.

aiTerms.content: Our Service uses artificial intelligence to create personalized content.

disclaimer.content: AI-generated content may contain unexpected or imperfect results. Minor variations in style, color, or interpretation are not considered defects and are part of the creative process. The AI system makes its best effort to match your specifications but cannot guarantee perfect results.

editing.title: Preview and Editing
editing.content: You will have the opportunity to preview and edit AI-generated content before finalizing your order. We recommend carefully reviewing all content before proceeding to payment.

limitations.title: AI Limitations
limitations.content: Our AI system cannot reproduce copyrighted characters, brand logos, or specific real people with perfect accuracy. Results are artistic interpretations based on your input.

liability.content: Our liability is limited as described in this section.

forceMajeure.content: We are not liable for failures to perform due to circumstances beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to: natural disasters, war, terrorism, labor disputes, government actions, or internet infrastructure failures. jurisdiction.content: Any dispute arising from these Terms shall be resolved in the courts of Ireland. For EU consumers, additional protections under local consumer laws may apply.

arbitration.content: Most disputes can be resolved through our customer service process. For unresolved disputes, we offer binding arbitration as an alternative to court proceedings, except for claims that may be brought in small claims court.

changes.content: For significant changes, we will notify you by email or prominent website notice. Minor changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

review.content: We encourage you to review these Terms periodically. The 'Last updated' date at the top of this page indicates when these Terms were last modified.

contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us:
